text: I suppose what I'm really asking is how to compute probabilities while being able to marginalize out some variables, and if this is possible to do through the above interface or some external mechanism.

elements.text: I suppose what I'm really asking is how to compute probabilities while being able to marginalize out some variables, and if this is possible to do through the above interface or some external mechanism.

text: We don’t do automatic marginalisation. You can sample from the posterior and then query the posterior chain though.

elements.text: We don’t do automatic marginalisation. You can sample from the posterior and then query the posterior chain though.

text:
the `chain = sample(model, ....)` is the sample of the posterior, correct? What do you mean by query the posterior chain, and how does that enable marginalization then?
